endpoints.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all available food items with detailed nutritional information.
Fetch all food categories to assist in narrowing down item selections.
Access a directory of food brands available within the service.
Find food items based on keywords, ingredients, or other search parameters.
Retrieve detailed information including nutrition for the specified food item by ID.
Display a list of common allergens to assist in filtering food choices.
Submit and track daily calorie consumption based on selected food items.
Customize portion size and update nutritional values for the specified food item.
Remove a previously logged entry from the calories tracker.
Get personalized food or meal suggestions based on user dietary preferences.
